edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file
Class WordPositions

java.lang.Object
  edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file.WordPositions
public class WordPositions
extends Object

Maintains a mapping between word forms and the positions that it can occupy. Currently these are only used for adjectives.

Constructor Summary
WordPositions()
          No-argument constructor.
 
Method Summary
 String getRequiredPosition(String wordForm)
          Returns the required position, if any, that the specified adjective must occupy relative to a noun it modifies.
 void setPosition(String wordForm, String position)
          Sets the position for a word.

Constructor Detail

WordPositions

public WordPositions()

Method Detail

setPosition

public void setPosition(String wordForm,
                        String position)
Sets the position for a word.

Parameters:
wordForm - Word form for which to specify the position.
position - Position in which the word form must occur.

getRequiredPosition

public String getRequiredPosition(String wordForm)
Returns the required position, if any, that the specified adjective must occupy relative to a noun it modifies.

Parameters:
wordForm - Word form for which to return the required syntactic position (if one exists).
Returns:
Syntactic position that the specified word form must occupy or null if there is no requirement on the position in which it must occur.
